Back to Robert Schumann

Robert Schumann

Toccata in C major, op. 7

1829–1830 (first version), 1833 (second version)

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

The extent to which the toccata is related to the Exercice fantastique (Anh. F11) or the Etude fantastique en doubles-sons (Anh. F12) is unclear.

Recommended editions

  • Gesamtausgabe (Schott) · III/1/2 · RSA 1017 · ed. Michael Beiche [both versions]
  • Henle · HN 920 · Sämtliche Klavierwerke / Band I · ed. Ernst Herttrich [both versions]
  • Henle · HN 921 · Sämtliche Klavierwerke / Band I · ed. Ernst Herttrich [both versions]
  • Henle · HN 201 · ed. Ernst Herttrich [both versions]

First version

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 5

Second version

Duration: 6' 30"

Difficulty: 5
